items.text: short on middle stump, gets deep in the crease and pulls to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: full toss outside off. A subdued drive that won't beat Holder's reach at mid-off. Shakib disappointed he didn't get that past
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: short of a length outside off, punched to long-off off the back foot
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short ball sliding down leg side, gets back and deflects this towards deep backward square
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: tossed up at leg stump, flicked to square leg off the front foot
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short of a length at off stump, gets deep in the crease and taps to sweeper cover off
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: length and angled into middle stump. Blocks it into the leg side with the angle
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length outside off, blocked on the front foot
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: top edge lands safely to third man's right. It's a short ball in the corridor. It's another one of those down-the-track-ugly-heaves from Tamim. The fielder takes it on the bounce
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: shot. That is solid, the exact opposite of what happened last ball. Full on off stump, stays strong and punches firmly with the full face. Bisects bowler and mid-off
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: pulled to deep square's right. Short ball at the chest and it's pulled sweetly
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: short of a length outside off, opens the face and deflects to third man
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: falls short of Bishoo but he didn't get down quickly at this. Lobbed up at a length on middle stump and he's looking to drive. Chips it back to Bishoo's left
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: length on middle, flicked to midwicket
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length ball pitches outside leg and spins further down as he looks to hoick
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 wide

items.text: short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: tossed up outside off, square drive to deep point
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, shuffles across and swipes it between square leg and short fine. Nicely placed
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: length on off stump, pokes into the leg side with the turn
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length ball skidding into leg stump. Hurriedly tapped to midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: short ball skidding outside off. Narrowly misses the outside edge as he looks to cut
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: length on middle, blocked on the front foot
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: short of a length on middle stump, punched to mid-on off the back foot
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, flicked to midwicket from deep in the crease
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run
